title: Input schema for the offers-csv-export actor.

memory.title: Memory
memory.description: Select memory in megabytes. Has to be power of 2.

useClient.title: Use client
useClient.description: Specifies if apify client or pure API should be used.

fields.title: Fields
fields.description: Enter dataset fields you want to export to CSV

maxItems.title: Max items
maxItems.description: Fill maximum number of items you want to export.
